attributes.action: prevent the DVLA releasing personal information about vehicle owners to parking management companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under current rules the Driver & Vehicle Licensing Authority (DVLA) provides vehicle owners' private details to any company that pays a fee. We feel that government has a poor record of managing personal information and should not be putting the public at risk by giving names and addresses to any organisation other than police forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
